citySearch.noResults: No results match your query, try a different term.

CityList.noCities: No locations added. To start tracking a location, search in the field above.

AboutView.title: About
AboutView.description: The Local Weather allows you to track the current and future weather of cities of your choosing.

details.first: 1. Search for your city by entering the name into the search bar.
details.second: 2. Select a city within the results, this will take you to the current weather for your selection.
details.third: 3. Track the city by clicking on the "save" icon in the top right. This will save the city to view at a later time on the home page.

second.title: Removing a city:
second.details: If you no longer wish to track a city, simply select the city within the home page. At the bottom of the page, there will be an option to delete the city.
